trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static predefined <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeight"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 提供一组预定义的静态<xref href="System.Windows.FontWeight"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A font weight describes the relative weight of a font, in terms of the lightness or heaviness of the strokes.
trans-unit.target: 字体粗细描述一种字体，根据笔画的描边的相对权重。

trans-unit.source: Weight differences are generally differentiated by an increased stroke or thickness that is associated with a given character in a font, as compared to a "normal" character from that same font.
trans-unit.target: 增加的笔画或与字体，从该相同的字体的"普通"字符相比中给定的字符关联的粗细通常区分粗细差异。

trans-unit.source: The FontWeights values correspond to the `usWeightClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: FontWeights 值对应于`usWeightClass`中的定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]规范。

trans-unit.source: The `usWeightClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 999.
trans-unit.target: `usWeightClass`表示介于 1 和 999 之间的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Lower values indicate lighter weights; higher values indicate heavier weights.
trans-unit.target: 较低的值指示字体较粗。较高值指示较重的权重。

trans-unit.source: |Font weight|usWeightClass| |-----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Thin%2A>|100| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.ExtraLight%2A>
<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraLight%2A>|200| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Light%2A>|300| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Normal%2A>
<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Regular%2A>|400| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Medium%2A>|500| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.DemiBold%2A>
<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.SemiBold%2A>|600| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Bold%2A>|700| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.ExtraBold%2A>
<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraBold%2A>|800| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Black%2A>
<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Heavy%2A>|900| |<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.ExtraBlack%2A>

<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraBlack%2A>|950| For more information about the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWeightClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraBlack%2A>|&950; | 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]`usWeightClass`值，请参阅["字体文件 Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm)部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]规范。</xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraBlack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies a "Black" font weight.
Black is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Heavy%2A>.
A value that represents a "Black" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"黑色"字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a "Bold" font weight.
A value that represents a "Bold" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"加粗"字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a "Demi-bold" font weight.
DemiBold is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.SemiBold%2A>.
A value that represents a "Demi-bold" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"细 bold"字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an "Extra-black" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 指定"超黑色"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: The ExtraBlack font weight is the heaviest font weight.
trans-unit.target: ExtraBlack 字体粗细是最繁忙的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: ExtraBlack is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraBlack%2A>.
A value that represents an "Extra-black" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"超黑色"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an "Extra-bold" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 指定"超加粗"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: ExtraBold is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraBold%2A>.
A value that represents an "Extra-bold" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"超加粗"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an "Extra-light" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 指定"超 light"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: ExtraLight is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.UltraLight%2A>.
A value that represents an "Extra-light" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"超 light"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a "Heavy" font weight.
Heavy is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Black%2A>.
A value that represents a "Heavy" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"高"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a "Light" font weight.
A value that represents a "Light" font weight.
Specifies a "Medium" font weight.
A value that represents a "Medium" font weight.
Specifies a "Normal" font weight.
Normal is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Regular%2A>.
A value that represents a "Normal" font weight.
Specifies a "Regular" font weight.
Regular is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Normal%2A>.
A value that represents a "Regular" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"常规"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a "Semi-bold" font weight.
SemiBold is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.DemiBold%2A>.
A value that represents a "Semi-bold" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"半 bold"字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a "Thin" font weight.
The Thin font weight is the lightest font weight.
trans-unit.target: 精简的字体粗细是最小的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a "Thin" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"细"字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an "Ultra-black" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 指定"超黑色"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: The UltraBlack font weight is the heaviest font weight.
trans-unit.target: UltraBlack 字体粗细是最繁忙的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: UltraBlack is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.ExtraBlack%2A>.
A value that represents an "Ultra-black" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"超黑色"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an "Ultra-bold" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 指定"超加粗"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: UltraBold is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.ExtraBold%2A>.
A value that represents an "Ultra-bold" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"超加粗"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an "Ultra-light" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 指定"超 light"的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: UltraLight is equivalent in font weight to <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.ExtraLight%2A>.
A value that represents an "Ultra-light" font weight.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，表示"超 light"的字体粗细。
